title: Someone sell me a HOF Old Judge Cabinet Tonight!!
author: Schwertfeger1007

posts.post_title: Someone sell me a HOF Old Judge Cabinet Tonight!!
posts.post_content:
I will pay strong if it's something I need. 

please pm me
Bump for Brian
Here is one..not a HOF'er but a cool card....

Hey Leon,

Thanks for sharing. Not exactly what I'm looking for but I'd listen to a price. 

Brian
Not mine, but this card will appear in the upcoming Hake's Auction.....
Now that's a beauty !!  Love the poses that are unique to N173.
I like the ones that are just unique;
That is a great cabinet, Jay.

love these Cabinets

Good Luck in your hunt

Thanks Phil! I'll keep and eye out for it. 

Anyone wanna guess final hammer on it?

BTW there is not a card in the world cooler than Jay's Ewing (Dapper) Street clothes.... That's a hill I'm willing to die on.

For those who might be interested in the N173 King Kelly in Street Clothes cabinet previously posted, here is a link to the auction currently going on and closing Tuesday, July 26th:

[url]https://www.hakes.com/Auction/ItemDetail/258943/1888-89-N173-OLD-JUDGE-CABINET-CARD-MIKE-KING-KELLY-HOF-RARE-STREET-CLOTHES-VERSION[/url]
My guess is $78,325. That may or may not be with the buyers commission. 😉

[quote name="oldjudge" post=2242196]My guess is $78,325. That may or may not be with the buyers commission. 😉[/QUOTE]

That's a very specific number Jay. I'd take the under. I've already started to see a drop in the market with inflation, looming recession ect.

Jay, I'll take the over, BP included, because of its rarity!
IMHO, those who have money and desire to purchase will not blink because of inflation and recession concerns.

Glenn
It is a beauty and my guess is approx 62k

Kelly closed at $42,834.00. Even I wouldn't have guess that low...

Also, bump for OJ Cabs!
Incredible Kelly in LOTG if you are looking for one.

[quote name="oldjudge" post=2251169]Incredible Kelly in LOTG if you are looking for one.[/QUOTE]

Jay, do you happen to have any estimate of how many OJ HOF cabinets are out there?
Do you mean total across all HOFers?

[quote name="oldjudge" post=2251183]Do you mean total across all HOFers?[/QUOTE]

Yes

They go all the way from Griffith who is not known with an N173 to Anson who is available. My wild ass guess would be in the 400-500 range. To put that in perspective any one is scarce but some are true rarities. Much less common than N172s, more common than Gypsy Queens.

[quote name="oldjudge" post=2251207]They go all the way from Griffith who is not known with an N173 to Anson who is available. My wild ass guess would be in the 400-500 range. To put that in perspective any one is scarce but some are true rarities. Much less common than N172s, more common than Gypsy Queens.[/QUOTE]

Much appreciated, thank you!
